class Mesh

Detailed Description

VertexBuffer holds references to VertexArrays that contain the positions, colors, normals, and texture coordinates for a set of vertices.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Creates an empty VertexBuffer with default values.

void setColors ( VertexArray *  colors  ) 

Sets the per-vertex color for this VertexBuffer.

x:[-128,127] --> y:[0,1] y = (x+128)/255

void setDefaultColor ( int  rgb  ) 

Sets the color to use in absence of per-vetex colors.

void setNormals ( VertexArray *  normals  ) 

Sets the normal vectors for this VertexBuffer.

x:[-128,127] --> y:[-1,1], or x:[-32768,32767] --> y:[-1,1] y = (2x+1)/255, or y = (2x+1)/65535
